actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Congressional Leadership should call for the 98th Congress to meet after the November election to impose an 18-month federal spending freeze and for the next President to convene a bipartisan deficit reduction summit conference.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the leadership of the Senate and the House of Representatives should schedule the 98th Congress to meet after the November election, whatever the outcome of the election, for the limited purpose of enacting an 18-month Federal spending freeze. Declares that the next President, whatever the outcome of the election, should convene a deficit reduction summit conference, with congressional leaders, for the purpose of designing a bipartisan long-term reduction package.

titles.title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Congressional Leadership should call for the 98th Congress to meet after the November election to impose an 18-month federal spending freeze and for the next President to convene a bipartisan deficit reduction summit conference.
